column5: Maybe we have a Shimano rep or someone out there that can tell me what the differenbce is between these 2 reels now that Shimano has redisgned the Curado. They all have the same features now and the only dif I can see is 20$msrp. Just curious... I have a new Curado and its awesome!
speed of retrieve, new curado is 7:1, chronarch is 6:1, then asthetics
